programme.title: Home run
programme.desc: As Rachel Atherton returns to MTB racing, she works to find a balance while Vali Höll prepares for success.

programme.title: Bros before foes
programme.desc: DH riders Loïc Bruni and Loris Vergier have their relationship put to the test as they compete against each.

programme.title: Barefoot Charles
programme.desc: Barefoot Charles Albert is a minimalist who climbs boulders in Fontainebleau, France, and lives in a cave.

programme.title: Big things to come
programme.desc: Alex Johnson spent a decade trying to climb The Swarm, USA. The challenge forces her to face her true self.

programme.title: Cenote
programme.desc: Adolfo 'Fito' Trujillo’s discovery of climbing in the limestone sinkholes turns the farmer’s life around.

programme.title: Cuddle part 1
programme.desc: Tommy Caldwell and Alex Honnold push their limits when they try to climb 17 alpine summits at high altitude.

programme.title: Cuddle part 2
programme.desc: The missed resupply pushes Tommy and Alex to the limit as they continue their challenge on empty stomachs.

programme.title: This is Beth
programme.desc: An intimate look beneath the success of legendary climber Beth Rodden, diving into her struggles and transformation.

programme.title: Bridge boys
programme.desc: Tom Randall and Pete Whittaker take on the most absurd crack climb when they end up under a motorway bridge.

programme.title: Flex
programme.desc: Matty Hong and Margo Hayes challenge themselves by ascending two of the hardest climbs in Colorado, USA.

programme.title: Smile and fight
programme.desc: Can big wall climber Natalia Grossman handle the pressure of defending her IFSC World Cup Champion title?

programme.title: Reel Rock: Alex Honnold in Nevada
programme.desc: Alex Honnold attempts his latest and most treacherous single-push solo mission in Red Rock Canyon, Nevada.

programme.title: The hurt part 2
programme.desc: Alex Honnold gears up for the hardest section of his Red Rock Canyon climb so far just in time for nightfall.

programme.title: Burning the flame part 1
programme.desc: Elite power duo Babsi and Jacopo attempt a coveted free ascent of the Nameless Tower in Pakistan.

programme.title: Burning the flame part 2
programme.desc: Babsi Zangerl and Jacopo Larcher’s two-year big wall climbing quest comes down to one short weather window.

programme.title: House of the gods part 1
programme.desc: Leo Houlding, Anna Taylor and Waldo Etherington attempt a new route up Mount Roraima in the Amazonian Jungle.

programme.title: House of the gods part 2
programme.desc: Anna Taylor must battle the hardest pitch yet to achieve the team's goal of a fully free ascent.

programme.title: Sleeping lion
programme.desc: Big wall climbing legend Chris Sharma introduces his mega new project in Siurana, Spain: the Sleeping Lion.

programme.title: Relive 2024’s record run
programme.desc: People impacted by spinal cord injury tell their stories as people around the world ran for those who can’t.

programme.title: Divers test their mental strength at Athens
programme.desc: Host Gracie Kramer explores how top divers Xantheia and Jonathan train their minds to get a winner's mentality

programme.title: HYROX World Championships highlights – Nice
programme.desc: Discover what makes HYROX – the indoor fitness competition – a test of strength, endurance and determination.

programme.title: Highlights – Bordeaux Premier Padel P2
programme.desc: See the best moments from the action-packed Bordeaux Premier Padel P2 tournament.

programme.title: Highlights – Brussels Premier Padel P2
programme.desc: Watch the highlights of the fifth stop of the season in Belgium for the Brussels Premier Padel P2.

programme.title: Highlights – Mar del Plata Premier Padel P1
programme.desc: Watch the highlights of the eighth stop of the season in Argentina from the Premier Padel Mar del Plata P1.
